pageContext.claim: “As far as John McCain is concerned, I was never a fan. And I will admit that openly. I disagreed with him on the endless wars. I disagreed with him with respect to the vets and the taking care of the VA. I wanted to do it a much different way. And I think it's proven to be a much more successful way when you look at the success we've had with the VA and with our vets, with Choice and with Accountability, all the things I've gotten.”
pageContext.analysis: In reality, the MISSION Act signed by Trump expanded an effort spearheaded by McCain in 2014, known as VA Choice, and was actually named after the late senator.
